content.html: The fact that so many people hate AMP the $3 iOS plugin to get rid of it is #1 in the app store is kind of an incredible sign of what a bad technology it is. Thank you, Google, for thrusting “technology so awful we’ll pay $3 to get rid of it” upon us.
content.value:
The fact that so many people hate AMP the $3 iOS plugin to get rid of it is #1 in the app store is kind of an incredible sign of what a bad technology it is.

Thank you, Google, for thrusting “technology so awful we’ll pay $3 to get rid of it” upon us.
